title: Grand Slam
content:
Grand Slam Weapon Actions 12~22 Damage 1d8+4Piercing+1d4Radiant+6Thunder Slam your weapon into the ground, thunderously impacting nearby foes and possibly pushing them away. On Save: Targets still take half damage. The target can't be pushed if it is Large or Huge in size. 3m DEX Save Short Rest Action
